Package Core.Pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
Core.Pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object
Die Klasse Piece repräsentiert eine Schachfigur.
